summary: In 2022, Muñoz et al. published the article "Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, and Game Technologies in Ophthalmology Training" in the journal Information. The article investigates software and hardware applications for educational use related to ophthalmology, and discusses the advantages and disadvantages, limitations, and challenges of the use of virtual reality, augmented reality, and game technologies in this field. The article also provides an analysis of other related tools, such as artificial eye models.
